data.message: Can you do more caffeine free drinks?? I can't drink it. I'd kill for a dr pepper!

replies.message: Hi Craig, thanks for getting in touch with us. We're always looking at new and exciting ways to innovate our brands based on consumer needs and their changing lifestyles. Unfortunately, we don’t have any plans to introduce more caffeine free ranges, but we'll be sure to share your comments with our team. Thanks
Why do you sell caffeine free dr pepper in the US but not the UK?
I have killed for a Dr Pepper

Hi Craig, we work locally, tailoring our drinks to local tastes. Some flavours are more popular in one country than another. Some of our brands are available in nearly 200 countries, whereas some are only available in certain countries. Thanks
I think you should send a dr pepper lover a free can of caffeine free dr pepper. I've waited over 10 years as my heart operation doesn't allow me caffeine and I need a can lol
